title: Designer for German WordPress business website
item_text: We are a small marketplace marketing agency from Germany. We are looking for a designer for our WordPress website.

title: WordPress – Custom work on existing site
item_text: We have a large WordPress website that needs various task list items taken care of. The work would start ASAP through early August. We are only looking for United States based resources...
